column1: Anuppur is a town in northeastern Madhya Pradesh state of central India. It is the administrative headquarters of the Anuppur tehsil and Anuppur District. Previously
Anuppur is located at 23.1°N 81.68°E﻿ / 23.1; 81.68. It has an average elevation of 505 metres (1
column2: 656 feet). The Son River and some of its tributaries run through Anuppur.
